Welcome to Suir Garages LTD.

CATERING FOR ALL YOUR TRACTOR & FARM MACHINERY REQUIREMENTS

Suir Garages provides sales and service of a wide range of farm machinery throughout Waterford County and the South East Region.

We also carry a very comprehensive range of spares in our well-stocked stores. Among our main franchises are Massey Ferguson, Kverneland, Strautmann, Hardi and McConnell.
